content:
Select Languages and Fields for Your Article Recommendation Model

Select supported languages to include in your model. Then select fields on cases and knowledge articles that Einstein Article Recommendations can analyze.

Available in: Lightning Experience, Enterprise, Performance, and Unlimited editions.
User permissions needed: Customize Application.

From Setup, enter Einstein Article Recommendations.
Create your model by selecting:
  Languages
  Unencrypted case fields
  Unencrypted Knowledge article fields

Build and activate the model after selection.
title: Selecting Fields for Einstein Article Recommendations
